Uses of Class
me.pavva.pokejava.Pokemon

  • Packages that use Pokemon 
    Package Description
    me.pavva.pokejava
    me.pavva.pokejava contains the classes required for the main game code including the setup, logic, Move and Pokemon Object Classes, and Type Enum.
    me.pavva.pokejava.pokemon
    me.pavva.pokejava.pokemon contains all the pokemon programmed into the game, organized by Type, into one of the 17 [TYPE]Pokemon.java classes.

    • Uses of Pokemon in me.pavva.pokejava

      Methods in me.pavva.pokejava with parameters of type Pokemon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Move.attack(Pokemon attacker, Pokemon defender, Move attackerMove)
      The main Damage Calculator of the PokeJava program.
      static double Type.doEffectCheck(Move move, Pokemon pokemon)
      Checks type effectivity.
      static double Type.doStabCheck(Move move, Pokemon pokemon)
      Checks for STAB (Same-Type-Attack-Bonus).
